title: Research progress in synthesis strategies of magnesium oxide nanoparticles for water treatment application
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,577-587
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00528C, Critical Review
Saeed Ahmed, Ashutosh Kumar
Magnesium oxide (MgO) is widely applied in various water treatment applications due to its fascinating properties.
